sentences.english: We can reset the seam and take in some of the material.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以重新安排縫口，並收進一點衣料。

sentences.english: I'd Iike to make a suit of this material.
sentences.chinese: 我想用這塊衣料做套服裝。

sentences.english: This dress material shrinks in the wash.
We are pleased to send you herewith attached Sample-Cuttings of Cotton Shirting and Sheeting.
sentences.chinese: 我方隨函附上棉布襯衫衣料與被單料的樣品片。

sentences.english: The fashion designer uses many pins to fix the dress materials together.
sentences.chinese: 時裝設計師用大頭針把衣料固定在一起。

sentences.english: We can reset the seams and take in some of the material.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以重新安排縫口，並收進一點衣料。

sentences.english: This synthetic dress material does not crush.
sentences.chinese: 這種合成纖維衣料不會皺。

sentences.english: Some of the new synthetic dress materials do not crush.
sentences.chinese: 有些新的合成衣料不起皺。

sentences.english: The facts show that the elementary research is the precursor in exploring the wide uses of silk besides clothing materials.
sentences.chinese: 說明基礎研究是開拓絹絲衣料外廣闊用途的重要先導。

sentences.english: The assistant measured off a dress-length from the roll.
sentences.chinese: 營業員從衣料捲上量出夠做一件連衣裙的料。

sentences.english: Thank you for your samples of striped coatings received today.
sentences.chinese: 今天收到你們寄來的帶條紋外衣料樣品，謝謝。

sentences.english: This dress material frays very quickly when you cut it.
sentences.chinese: 這種衣料在剪裁時非常容易磨損。

sentences.english: He said , unfolding a piece of material like a shopman.
sentences.chinese: 他像店員一樣抖開一塊衣料說。

sentences.english: I selected the materials for a suit, with the assistance of Mr. Tabb's judgment.
sentences.chinese: 我參照了特拉白先生的意見，選好了一套衣料。

sentences.english: This dress material will withstand repeated washings.
sentences.chinese: 這種衣料能經得住反覆洗滌。
